name: Wannabe Hero: The Power of Friendship
name_original: Wannabe Hero: The Power of Friendship
description:
V.V., a rookie mercenary, stumbles upon an enchanted door. In order to get past it, she’ll need to gather 6 orbs in order to unlock it. It’s a good thing that her friends and associates have the orbs she needs. Join her on this point-and-click adventure to help her reach her goal!

Characters based on the web comic "Wannabe Hero"

  • http://wannabeherocomic.com

Character art by Keraunic Tonic

  • https://keraunic-tonic.com

Background art by ChibiTomboy

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChibiTomboy

This game was created as a final project for the Code Coven summer course!
